personal.name: Your Name
personal.title: AI Engineer & Researcher
personal.bio: Passionate AI Engineer and Researcher who loves building intelligent systems while crafting adorable unicorn-themed projects. When not training models or writing code, you'll find me crocheting cute characters or collecting My Little Pony memorabilia.
personal.tagline: Building AI magic, one algorithm at a time

description: Lead a team of 5 engineers in developing cutting-edge AI solutions for healthcare applications
Built and deployed machine learning models serving 1M+ users daily
Architected scalable MLOps pipelines reducing deployment time by 70%
achievements: Reduced model inference latency by 60% through optimization
Led successful migration to cloud-native ML platform
Mentored 3 junior engineers to senior level

description: Researched novel deep learning architectures for computer vision tasks
Published 4 peer-reviewed papers in top-tier AI conferences
Collaborated with product teams to translate research into production features
achievements: Achieved state-of-the-art results on ImageNet classification
Patent filed for novel attention mechanism
Presented research at NeurIPS and ICLR conferences

projects.title: UnicornGPT - AI Chat Companion
projects.description: A whimsical AI chatbot that combines advanced NLP with unicorn personality
projects.longDescription: Built a delightful AI companion that provides helpful responses while maintaining a magical unicorn personality. Uses fine-tuned language models with custom prompt engineering to create engaging, helpful, and adorable conversations.

projects.title: Crochet Pattern Generator AI
projects.description: ML model that generates unique crochet patterns from text descriptions
projects.longDescription: Developed a computer vision and NLP system that can generate detailed crochet patterns from simple text descriptions. The model understands stitch types, color combinations, and pattern complexity to create printable instructions.

projects.title: My Little Pony Character Classifier
projects.description: Deep learning model to identify and classify MLP characters with 98% accuracy
projects.longDescription: A fun computer vision project that can identify My Little Pony characters from images with high accuracy. Includes data collection, model training, and a cute web interface for testing.

achievements: Research Assistant in Computer Vision Lab
Published thesis on novel neural network architectures
